blogPost.excerpt: No need to hire AI developers or specialists to introduce new technology and diversify your business. CLICK AI allows anyone to create deep learning-based AI models fast, with high accuracy, and without limitation by AI type/industry group.
blogPost.body: No need to hire AI developers or specialists to introduce new technology and diversify your business. CLICK AI allows anyone to create deep learning-based AI models fast, with high accuracy, and without limitation by AI type/industry group.
blogPost.title: CLICK AI - Develop AI in one click without any coding
blogPost.author: Anastasiia Naiden

localize.description: 无需聘请人工智能开发人员或专家，引进新技术，实现业务多元化。CLICK AI让任何人都可以快速、高精度地创建基于深度学习的AI模型，且不受AI类型/行业组的限制。
localize.tagline: 无需任何编码，一键开发AI

localize.description: 無需聘請人工智能開發人員或專家，引進新技術，實現業務多元化。CLICK AI讓任何人都可以快速、高精度地創建基於深度學習的AI模型，且不受AI類型/行業組的限制。
localize.tagline: 無需任何編碼，一鍵開發AI

previous.excerpt: Shopping online can be hard and expensive. Closet AI lets you upload a photo of a clothing item from the internet or your own closet and quickly uses AI to build an outfit that matches your item based on 100,000+ items, 100+ brands and your price range! 🚀
previous.title: Closet AI - Build your next outfit with AI

localize.description: 网上购物又难又贵。衣柜AI让你从网上或自己的衣柜里上传一张衣服的照片，根据10万+商品、100+品牌和你的价格区间，快速用AI打造一套与你的商品相匹配的衣服! 🚀
localize.tagline: 用AI打造你的下一件衣服

localize.description: 網上購物又難又貴。衣櫃AI讓你從網上或自己的衣櫃裏上傳一張衣服的照片，根據10萬+商品、100+品牌和你的價格區間，快速用AI打造一套與你的商品相匹配的衣服! 🚀
localize.tagline: 用AI打造你的下一件衣服

next.excerpt: Hugo improves meeting productivity for teams. It connects to your work calendar providing one place to collaboratively prepare, take notes, assign tasks and share insights. ⠀ Get on top of remote meetings with notes that connect to your team and their tools.
next.title: Hugo - Better meetings through centralized, actionable notes

localize.description: 雨果提高了团队的会议效率。它与您的工作日历相连接，提供一个协作准备、记录、分配任务和分享见解的地方。⠀ 通过连接到您的团队和他们的工具的笔记，掌握远程会议的情况。
localize.tagline: 通过集中的、可操作的说明改进会议

localize.description: 雨果提高了團隊的會議效率。它與您的工作日曆相連接，提供一個協作準備、記錄、分配任務和分享見解的地方。⠀ 通過連接到您的團隊和他們的工具的筆記，掌握遠程會議的情況。
localize.tagline: 通過集中的、可操作的說明改進會議
